attributes.action: either ban smoking completely or not at all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current government is one of half measures. I propose that smoking should be banned completely or not at all. This would help both smokers and non-smokers. Anyone can give up if they can't buy them!
I understand this can't happen because you  rely on the tax for the NHS but you  should raise it elsewhere!
I smoke but would welcome either a complete ban or a stop to the persecution.
